title: Manappuram Finance to raise up to Rs 7,800 cr in FY23 - Business Standard
content: Manappuram Finance to raise up to Rs 7,800 cr in FY23  Business Standard
description: The gold financier said it proposed to list the bonds on BSE or NSE and the tenure of the instrument, date of allotment, maturity and coupon will be decided by the board at the time of allotment
